

def S(n):
	sum = 0
	while n:
		q = n%10
		if q%2==0:
			sum+=2*q
		else:
			sum+=q
		n/=10
	return sum

def solve(A,B):
	sum = 0
	while A%10:	#get it to a multiple of 10 first
		sum+=S(A)%10
		A+=1
		if A>B:
			return sum
	B2 = 10*(B/10)  #a multiple of 10
	diff = B2-A
	sum += (diff/10)*45
	while B2<=B:
		sum+=S(B2)%10
		B2+=1
	return sum

T = int(raw_input())

while T>0:
	T-=1
	A, B = map(int, raw_input().split())
	answer = solve(A,B)
	print(answer)
